mapper.insert: INSERT INTO inquiry_comment (inquiry_id, author_id, is_admin, content) VALUES (#{inquiryId}, #{authorId}, #{isAdmin}, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT comment_id AS commentId, inquiry_id AS inquiryId, author_id AS authorId, is_admin AS isAdmin, content, created_at AS createdAt FROM inquiry_comment WHERE inquiry_id = #{inquiryId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM inquiry_comment WHERE comment_id = #{commentId} AND author_id = #{authorId}
